text: @realDonaldTrump No masks around 90 yr old veterans you pos potus. Looks like you may be getting Covid19 soon, though. Nazi Miller and your valet driver....it’s coming for you!!!!just think, lungs filled up, gasping for breath. Must be awful, huh? The parade is coming. You did want one, right?
